snippet: The country’s largest marketers are slashing their advertising budgets because digital offers more, for less money.
abstract: Report from Kantar Media finds that nation's 10 biggest advertisers cut ad spending by 4.2 percent in 2014, to $15.3 billion; trend is partly attributable to higher spending on digital advertising, which enables marketers to buy more for less.
lead_paragraph: The country’s largest marketers are slashing their advertising budgets because digital offers more, for less money.

headline.main: Biggest Advertisers Are Sending Their Dollars to Digital
headline.print_headline: Biggest Advertisers Are Sending Their Dollars to Digital
